post:
Our Black Friday Offers officially begin today (20th November - 27th November) and we are pleased to introduce our special plans created only for this week long event after which they will no longer be available.
We have free web hosting with slected purchases of our VPS ranges and Shared NVMe SSD plans for under £6 per year.

Our Black Friday offers kick off with a generous 20% off all of our existing shared hosting, reseller hosting and VPS plans.
Use code "BF20CM" at checkout to apply the discount to your order. https://hostdoc.co.uk

But we have done much better than 20% and created limited plans for the black friday week with savings over 80% on our shared hosting range.

Our shared hosting server is located in Germany and runs on NVMe SSD for optimal performance and stability.
Cpanel and cloudlinux, Jetbackup, Softaculous with one click app installations, daily offsite backup's, autoSSL and much more.
